plot: Unscrupulous businessman Gavin Richman is a cutthroat in both his professional and his personal life. When he is robbed and left stripped and penniless on the streets, he learns that his old manner will no longer serve him.
title: Mergers & Acquisitions
plot_es: Unscrupulous businessman Gavin Richman is a cutthroat in both his professional and his personal life. When he is robbed and left stripped and penniless on the streets, he learns that his old manner will no longer serve him.
plot_en: Unscrupulous businessman Gavin Richman is a cutthroat in both his professional and his personal life. When he is robbed and left stripped and penniless on the streets, he learns that his old manner will no longer serve him.

produce.name: Center For Advanced Film & Television Studies
